metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5419 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
curl and libcurl before 7.50.1 do not prevent TLS session resumption when the client certificate has changed, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended restrictions by resuming a session.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5419` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.1').
